Delegation of Pyongyang city leaves for Russia
    Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Pyongyang city led by Ryang Man Gil, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, left here today to visit Russia.
 It was seen off at the airport by Jon Ho Hyon, vice-chairman of the committee, and Andrei Karlov, Russian ambassador to the DPRK.
